content:
Title: The Unpredictable Journey of Levi Mootz: From Universal Engraving to Director of Systems

Introduction:

1. Welcome and introduction of Levi Mootz (1-2 minutes)
2. Brief background on Levi's exciting and diverse career (2-3 minutes)

Segment 1: Life in Overland Park and Universal Engraving (10 minutes)

1. Nostalgic memories of working together at Universal Engraving
2. Funny stories from their time at the company
3. How Levi's experiences in Overland Park influenced his future adventures

Segment 2: Rapid Realty and Life in Brooklyn (15 minutes)

1. The story behind Levi's decision to open a Rapid Realty office in Prospect Heights, Brooklyn
2. Challenges and successes in the real estate business
3. Unique experiences and amusing anecdotes from life in Brooklyn

Segment 3: The First Lobster Boat Adventure (10 minutes)

1. Transitioning to work as a sternman on a lobster boat
2. Hilarious stories from life on the lobster boat
3. Lessons learned from this experience

Segment 4: The Irish Experience (15 minutes)

1. What inspired Levi to move to Ireland
2. Cultural differences and amusing experiences in Ireland
3. How living in Ireland impacted his personal and professional life

Segment 5: The Second Lobster Boat Adventure (10 minutes)

1. Returning to work as a sternman on a lobster boat
2. Comparing the two lobster boat experiences
3. New challenges and funny incidents during the second stint

Segment 6: Becoming the Director of Systems at a Workflow Automation Company (10 minutes)

1. The journey to become a self-taught software developer and Linux system administrator
2. Funny stories and challenges faced during the self-teaching journey
3. How the diverse background helped in becoming the Director of Systems

Closing Segment: Rapid Fire Questions and Final Thoughts (5 minutes)

1. Rapid fire questions for a few laughs (e.g., favorite food in Ireland, strangest real estate request, etc.)
2. Advice from Levi for those looking to embark on their own adventures
3. Final thoughts and closing remarks

Maintain a light and entertaining tone throughout the conversation, encouraging Levi to share humorous anecdotes and experiences from his diverse career. The chronological order will help listeners follow Levi's unique journey more easily.
